Description: ON/OFF state,the current state of the device. This state is only valid for Switch Mode, where `on` stands for on and `off` stands for off. It will return `on` or `off` in Press Mode or Customize Mode, but the returned value can be neglected.
the current battery level, 0-100

the time stamp when the event is sent
